name: Planet To Planet
description:
Planet to Planet is a beautiful single touch game featuring a mix of cartoonish and realistic space graphics.

The game is about controlling your rocket ship and trying to take it as high as possible without hitting any of the planets that might come across you on your journey.

If you get close to a planet that you can cross without turning, then you can touch the screen to activate the sling which will connect to the nearest planet and your rocket will start to rotate around it. When you remove your finger from the screen the sling will be detached and the rocket will start moving in whichever direction it would be facing.

You can connect as many times as you like. Make sure you don't hit any other planet while rotating around one. The side boundaries would not harm you when you are touching the screen.

You can also collect gems on your way which can be used to unlock new ships. There are 7 different ships which can be used to play.
